```py
>>> minimizer = optimize.brent(f, brack=(1, 2))
>>> minimizer
1
>>> res = optimize.brent(f, brack=(-1, 0.5, 2), full_output=True)
>>> xmin, fval, iter, funcalls = res
>>> f(xmin), fval
(0.0, 0.0)
```
